00070 // Define the length of the header (non-payload part) of a data frame
00071 #define ftDataHeaderSize offsetof(ftData, payload)
00072 
00073 //6lowpan interface (temp)
00074 void sixlowpan_DataIndication(ftData *frame, uint8_t payloadlen);

00077 // Globals
00078 static u16 pingAddr;  // temp var
00079 static u16 pingType;  // temp var
00080 
00081 // Stored frames (if RUMSLEEP is set)
00082 typedef struct {
00083     u8  len;         // Length of stored frame (zero if this element is unused)
00084     u16 addr;        // Short address of node to receive frame
00085     u8  buf[128];    // Buffer to store frame in
00086 } tStoredFrame;
00087 #define STORED_FRAMES  3     // Number of stored frames
00088 static tStoredFrame storedFrames[STORED_FRAMES * (RUMSLEEP && NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE && VLP)];
00089 
00090 // Target function for timer, send a frame prepared by macDataRequest()
00091 void mdr_timer(void)
00092 {
00093     // Create a struct pointer to the global variable...
00094     ftData *data_frame = (ftData*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00095 
00096     radioSendData(*mac_buffer_tx, (u8*)data_frame);
00097 }
00098 
00111 static void macDataRequestInt(u16 addr, u8 len, u8 * data, u8 type)
00112 {
00113     // Create a struct pointer to the global variable...
00114     ftData *data_frame = (ftData*)(mac_buffer_tx+1);
00115     u8 rpSent; // Was a routing packet sent?
00116 
00117     if (addr == macConfig.shortAddress ||
00118         addr == BROADCASTADDR)
00119         // Don't send to self
00120         return;
00121 
00122     if (!macConfig.associated)
00123         // This node has no short address
00124         return;
00125 
00126     // Build the frame.
00127     data_frame->fcf = FCF_DATA;
00128     data_frame->seq = macConfig.dsn++;
00129     data_frame->panid = macConfig.panId;
00130     data_frame->srcAddr = macConfig.shortAddress;
00131     data_frame->finalDestAddr = addr;
00132     data_frame->originAddr = macConfig.shortAddress;
00133 
00134     // send a routing packet if necessary
00135     rpSent = macSendRoutingPacket(addr);
00136 
00137     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00138     {
00139         // Find the child node that can route this packet
00140         u16 child = addr;
00141         u16 parent = macGetParent(child);
00142         while (parent != DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR)
00143         {
00144             child = parent;
00145             parent = macGetParent(child);
00146         }
00147         // send to child node that can route this packet
00148         data_frame->destAddr = child;
00149     }
00150     else
00151         // All data is send to parent, unless this is a wakeup frame
00152         if (type == WAKE_NODE)
00153             data_frame->destAddr = addr;
00154         else
00155             data_frame->destAddr = macConfig.parentShortAddress;
00156 
00157     // Frame type is data
00158     if (macConfig.sleeping && NODETYPE == ENDDEVICE && RUMSLEEP)
00159         // Set high bit of type if we're sleeping
00160         type |= 0x80;
00161     data_frame->type = type;
00162 
00163 
00164     // Copy the payload data to frame. (note: this creates smaller code than using memcpy!!)
00165     u8 i;
00166     for(i=0; i<len; i++)
00167         ((u8*)&data_frame->payload)[i] = *data++;
00168 
00169     // Check addresses again - addr will be different now
00170     if (data_frame->destAddr == macConfig.shortAddress ||
00171         data_frame->destAddr == BROADCASTADDR)
00172         // Don't send to self
00173         return;
00174 
00175     // send data to radio, after some time delay
00176     *mac_buffer_tx = len + ftDataHeaderSize; // save length away
00177     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00178     {
00179         // See if the child is sleeping (only the coord sends directly to a child node)
00180         if (RUMSLEEP &&
00181             macIsChild(addr) &&
00182             macIsChildSleeping(addr) && VLP)
00183             // Send it later, after child is awake
00184             macHoldFrame(addr, (u8*)data_frame, (u8)*mac_buffer_tx);
00185         else
00186             // Node is not sleeping child, send it now.
00187             macSetAlarm(rpSent ? MAC_RP_DELAY : MAC_DATA_DELAY, mdr_timer);
00188     }
00189     else
00190         macSetAlarm((type==WAKE_NODE || type == DEBUG_FRAME) ? 0 : MAC_DATA_DELAY, mdr_timer);
00191     macConfig.busy = true;
00192 }
00193 
00204 void macDataRequest(u16 addr, u8 len, u8 * data)
00205 {
00206     macDataRequestInt(addr, len, data, DATA_FRAME);
00207 }
00208 
00217 void macWakeRequest(u16 addr, u16 child)
00218 {
00219     if (NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE)
00220     {
00221         macDataRequestInt(addr, 2, (u8*)&child, WAKE_NODE);
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00229 void macOtaDebugRequest(u8 *str)
00230 {
00231     if (NODETYPE != COORD)
00232     {
00233         macDataRequestInt(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, strlen((char *)str)+1, str, DEBUG_FRAME);
00234     }
00235 }

00250 void macsixlowpanDataRequest(u16 addr, u8 len, u8 * data)
00251 {
00252     if (IPV6LOWPAN == 1)
00253         macDataRequestInt(addr, len, data, DATA_FRAME_6LOWPAN);
00254 }

00261 void macDataIndication(void)
00262 {
00263     // Sort out the different types of data packets.
00264     ftData *frame = (ftData*)(mac_buffer_rx+1);
00265 
00266 #if (__arm__)
00267     volatile s16 queue;
00268     if(fnGetTCP_state(host_socket) == TCP_STATE_ESTABLISHED)
00269     {
00270         if( (frame->fcf != FCF_BEACONREQ) &&
00271             (frame->fcf != FCF_ASSOC_REQ_DIRECT) &&
00272             (frame->fcf != FCF_ASSOC_REQ_IND) )
00273         {
00274             // ACK handling should occur in the tcpListener function in
00275             // rumtask.c.
00276             // fnSendBufTCP returns the number of bytes buffered if successful...
00277             queue = fnSendBufTCP(host_socket, (u8 *)"WIRELESSD", 9, TCP_BUF_SEND);
00278             if(telPrintReading && (queue > 0))
00279                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nWIRELESSD buffered for TCP");
00280             else
00281                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nWIRELESSD buffer problem");
00282             queue = fnSendBufTCP(host_socket, mac_buffer_rx, mac_buffer_rx[0]+1, TCP_BUF_SEND);
00283             if(telPrintReading && (queue > 0))
00284                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nData indication buffered for TCP");
00285             else
00286                 fnDebugMsg("\r\nData indication buffer problem");
00287         }
00288     }
00289 #endif
00290 
00291     switch (frame->type & 0x7f)  // Mask high bit just in case it was somehow missed
00292     {
00293     case DATA_FRAME:
00294         // Plain old data, send it up the chain
00295         appDataIndication();
00296         break;
00297     case DEBUG_FRAME:
00298         // Frame containing debug message, print it on coord
00299         if (NODETYPE == COORD && OTA_DEBUG && DEBUG)
00300         {
00301             debugMsgStr("\r\nNode ");
00302             debugMsgInt(frame->originAddr);
00303             debugMsgStr(": ");
00304 
00305             // Remove leading cr/lf's from string
00306             u8 *p = frame->payload;
00307             while (*p)
00308             {
00309                 if (*p > ' ')
00310                     break;
00311                 p++;
00312             }
00313             debugMsgStr((char *)p);
00314         }
00315         break;
00316     case WAKE_NODE:
00317         // Wake up the end node.
00318         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00319         {
00320             u8 addr = ((ftWake*)frame)->addr;
00321             // See if this is from parent or child
00322             if ((((ftWake*)frame)->srcAddr) == macConfig.parentShortAddress)
00323                 // Set the flag to wake up the end node when it sends a packet
00324                 macWakeChildNode(addr);
00325         }
00326         if (NODETYPE == ENDDEVICE)
00327         {
00328             // Wake yourself up now
00329             macConfig.sleeping = false;
00330             // Send parent a confirmation that we are awake
00331             macDataRequestInt(macConfig.parentShortAddress,
00332                               2,
00333                               (u8*)&macConfig.shortAddress,
00334                               WAKE_NODE);
00335             debugMsgStr("\r\nAwake");
00336         }
00337         break;
00338     case PING_REQ_FRAME:
00339         // We got a ping request, let the app handle that
00340         appPingReq(frame->originAddr);
00341         break;
00342     case PING_RSP_FRAME:
00343         // We got a ping response, app will handle it
00344         appPingRsp(frame->originAddr);
00345         break;
00346     case DROP_CHILD_FRAME:
00347         // Coordinator is telling us to drop a child
00348         if (NODETYPE == ROUTER)
00349             macRemoveChild(*(u16*)(&frame->payload));
00350         break;
00351     case DATA_FRAME_6LOWPAN:
00352         //6lowpan data indication
00353         if (IPV6LOWPAN == 1)
00354             sixlowpan_DataIndication(frame, *mac_buffer_rx - 16);
00355         break;
00356     default:
00357         break;
00358     }
00359 }
00360 
00361 // Target function to timer, sends ping packet after a delay
00362 void mp(void)
00363 {
00364     ftPing frame;
00365 
00366     frame.fcf = FCF_DATA;
00367     frame.seq = macConfig.dsn++;
00368     frame.panid = macConfig.panId;
00369     frame.srcAddr = macConfig.shortAddress;
00370     frame.originAddr = macConfig.shortAddress;
00371     frame.finalDestAddr = pingAddr;
00372     frame.type = pingType;
00373     frame.rssi = radioGetSavedRssiValue();
00374     frame.lqi = radioGetSavedLqiValue();
00375 
00376     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00377     {
00378         // Find the top parent
00379         u8 addr = macGetTopParent(pingAddr);
00380         frame.destAddr = addr;
00381         // See if the child is sleeping (only the coord sends directly to a child node)
00382         if (RUMSLEEP &&
00383             macIsChild(addr) &&
00384             macIsChildSleeping(addr))
00385         {
00386             // Send it later, after child is awake
00387             macHoldFrame(addr, (u8*)&frame, sizeof(ftPing));
00388             // Don't send frame right now
00389             return;
00390         }
00391     }
00392     else
00393         // End/router nodes
00394         frame.destAddr = macConfig.parentShortAddress;
00395 
00396     radioSendData(sizeof(ftPing), (u8*)&frame);
00397 }
00398 
00407 void macPing(u8 pingTypeArg, u16 addr)
00408 {
00409     if (addr == macConfig.shortAddress)
00410         // Don't send to self
00411         return;
00412 
00413     if (!macConfig.associated)
00414         // Broadcast addr
00415         return;
00416 
00417     pingAddr = addr;
00418     pingType = pingTypeArg;
00419 
00420     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00421     {
00422         // First send a routing packet
00423         u8 rpSent;
00424         rpSent = macSendRoutingPacket(addr);
00425         macSetAlarm(rpSent ? MAC_RP_DELAY : 0, mp);
00426         macConfig.busy = true;
00427     }
00428     else
00429     {
00430         // End/router nodes
00431         mp();
00432         macConfig.busy = true;
00433     }
00434 }
00435 
00436 
00447 void macHoldFrame(u16 addr, u8 *buf, u8 len)
00448 {
00449     if (NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE && RUMSLEEP && VLP)
00450     {
00451         u8 i,done=0;
00452 
00453         for (i=0;i<STORED_FRAMES;i++)
00454         {
00455             if (!storedFrames[i].len)
00456             {
00457                 if (!done)  // Only store once
00458                 {
00459                     debugMsgStr("\r\nHolding frame");
00460                     // This one's free, use it
00461                     storedFrames[i].len = len;
00462                     storedFrames[i].addr = addr;
00463                     memcpy(storedFrames[i].buf, buf, len);
00464                     // Don't store this frame twice
00465                     done = 1;
00466                 }
00467             }
00468             else
00469             {
00470                 // This item is used, make sure it isn't for this address,
00471                 // since we only want to store one pending frame for each
00472                 // sleeping node.
00473                 if (storedFrames[i].addr == addr)
00474                     // Delete this frame
00475                     storedFrames[i].len = 0;
00476             }
00477         }
00478     }
00479 }
00480 
00485 void macSendStoredFrame(u16 addr)
00486 {
00487     if (NODETYPE != ENDDEVICE && RUMSLEEP && VLP)
00488     {
00489         u8 i;
00490 
00491         // See if a frame is stored for this node
00492         for (i=0;i<STORED_FRAMES;i++)
00493         {
00494             if (storedFrames[i].len &&
00495                 storedFrames[i].addr == addr)
00496             {
00497                 // Send this frame, remove checksum
00498                 radioSendData(storedFrames[i].len, storedFrames[i].buf);
00499                 // Clear out this frame
00500                 storedFrames[i].len = 0;
00501             }
00502         }
00503     }
00504
